sample.session.client

Class DAVIDParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.session.client.DAVIDParser

  • public class DAVIDParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible to dump DAVID's different outputs to tab separated files. These includes: 1) ChartReport: 2) TableReport: 3) GeneClusterReport: 4) TermClusterReport: Fun 5) ListReport: Show Gene List associated data (id, gene name, organism)
    Since:
    2012-12-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Modifications by Cristobal Fresno (cristobalATgmailDOTcom) to DAVID's JavaClient-1.1.zip

      • writeChartReport

        public static void writeChartReport(java.lang.String fileName,
                    sample.session.service.xsd.SimpleChartRecord[] simpleChartRecords)
        Parse DAVID's ChartReport and write them to a file using a StringBuffer.
        Parameters:
        fileName - String with the output file name.
        simpleChartRecords - returned by DAVID's ChartReport output.

      • writeListReport

        public static void writeListReport(java.lang.String fileName,
                   david.xsd.ListRecord[] listRecords,
                   java.lang.String idType)
        Parse DAVID's ListReport and write them to a file using a StringBuffer.
        Parameters:
        fileName - String with the output file name.
        listRecords - returned by DAVID's ListReport output.
        idType - String with DAVID's used id type for the specified list.
